title: Trump says he wants more immigrants from 'everywhere'
text:
Trump says he wants more immigrants from 'everywhere' President Trump says he want immigrants from around the world to come to the U.S. "I want them to come in from everywhere," Trump told reporters. Trump denies calling some developing nations "shithole countries." Published 2 Hours Ago SHARES Cheriss May | NurPhoto | Getty Images President Donald Trump in the East Room of the White House, on Wednesday, January 10, 2018. 
U.S. President Donald Trump , asked whether he wanted more immigrants from Norway, said on Tuesday that he wanted the United States to draw immigrants from nations around the world. 
"I want them to come in from everywhere," Trump told reporters. U.S. Democratic Senator Dick Durbin said last week that Trump had repeatedly use the word "s---hole" when speaking about African countries and the Caribbean nation of Haiti. Trump has denied using that language.
